thread.title: Snow showers today with a winter storm on the way Sunday afternoon and night
thread.title_full: Snow showers today with a winter storm on the way Sunday afternoon and night

author: Thomas Battle
title: Snow showers today with a winter storm on the way Sunday afternoon and night
text: Friday may be a bit more on the cloudy side with a few rain or snow showers possible by the afternoon. The highs will be in the low 40s and that will mean snow is likely at elevation. The highs will be in the mid 40s, but it feels mostly like yesterday. The lows drop to the low 20s tonight as the cold air rushes back in. The rest of the weekend is going to get cold and messy. Temperatures could drop rather unpleasantly by the weekend with a dramatic fall below average in our highs and lows. The highs may be in the 30s Saturday with sunshine throughout the day with lows plunging well into the 20s. SEE ALSO: Weather Alert Day: Rain, freezing rain, sleet and snow ahead We are making Sunday and Monday Weather Alert Days due to a winter storm headed our way Sunday night and Monday morning. Right now plan for a wintry mix starting Sunday afternoon with mostly snow falling Sunday night and into Monday. It's too early for totals, but I think we should be seeing area wide snow with it sticking around for a little bit. Travel impacts should be expected late Sunday and early Monday with ice and snow mixing and freezing overnight. We'll likely see some spots at elevation getting a couple of inches of snow if the warmer air doesn't hit you. Mix storms like this one make it difficult to point to where the worst roads will be. Some spots will just have wet roads, while a few miles away could have ice-covered roads. Power outages could be possible thanks to freezing rain and ice forming on power lines. It looks like the ice is becoming our biggest weather concern with this system. SEE ALSO: 1 arrested, charged with October murder of Anthony Davis; 2 suspects still at large: LPD After the rain and snow starts to wrap up Monday, we'll see some quieter weather by the evening as temperatures drop. The week ahead is going to bring brutal cold for the entire week with highs only in the 30s.
